mapper.select: select m.mem_num, md.name, md.mem_id, m.nick, m.MEM_STATUS, md.birth, m.img, case when TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TO_DATE(md.birth,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12) >= 10 then case when mod(TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TO_DATE(md.birth,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12), 10) < 5 then TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TO_DATE(md.birth,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 / 10) ||'0대 초반' else TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(SYSDATE), TO_DATE(md.birth,'YYYY-MM-DD')) / 12 / 10) ||'0대 후반' end else '어린이' end age_range, md.addr || ' ' || md.addr_detail addr, md.tel, md.gender, m.LOGIN_FLAG, st.name social, m.join_date, ml.recent_login_date, m.SUSPEND_DATE, m.UNSUSPEND_DATE, m.WITHDRAW_DATE from member m, member_detail md, SOCIAL_LOGIN sl, SOCIAL_TYPE st, ( select mem_num, max(input_date) recent_login_date from MEMBER_LOGIN_LOG where input_date <= sysdate group by mem_num ) ml where md.mem_num(+) = m.mem_num and sl.mem_num(+) = m.mem_num and st.SOCIAL_NUM(+) = sl.SOCIAL_NUM and ml.mem_num(+) = m.mem_num and m.mem_num = #{memNum}
mapper.update:
update member set SUSPEND_DATE=sysdate, MEM_STATUS='S'
, UNSUSPEND_DATE = to_date(#{unsuspendDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1 - 1/24/60/60
, UNSUSPEND_DATE = trunc(sysdate + to_number(#{suspendPeriod}) + 1) - 1/24/60/60
where mem_num = #{memNum} and MEM_STATUS = 'N'
update member set UNSUSPEND_DATE = sysdate, MEM_STATUS='N' where mem_num=#{memNum} and MEM_STATUS='S'
mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from MEMBER_LOGIN_LOG where mem_num = #{memNum} and input_date <= sysdate

select count(*) from steam s, goods g, GOODS_IMG gi, member m where s.GOODS_NUM = g.GOODS_NUM and gi.GOODS_NUM = g.GOODS_NUM and g.mem_num_sell = m.mem_num and s.mem_num = #{memNum}
and g.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and g.detail like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and m.nick like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select count(*) from inquiry where mem_num = #{memNum}
and TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and CONTENTS like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and input_date >= #{startDate}
and input_date < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
and answer_Flag = 'N'
and answer_Flag = 'Y'

select count(*) from report r, member m, goods g where r.goods_num = g.goods_num and g.MEM_NUM_SELL = m.mem_num and r.MEM_NUM_REP = #{memNum}
and r.TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and r.CONTENTS like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and m.nick like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and g.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and g.detail like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and r.input_date >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and r.input_date < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
and r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE = '00'
and r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE not in ('00', '11')
and r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE = '11'

select TITLE,CONTENTS,NICK_SELL,INPUT_DATE,PROCESS_STATUS_CODE,PROCESS_DATE from ( select row_number() over(order by r.input_date desc) rnum, r.title, r.CONTENTS, m.nick nick_sell, r.INPUT_DATE, r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE, r.PROCESS_DATE from report r, member m, goods g where r.goods_num = g.goods_num and g.MEM_NUM_SELL = m.mem_num and r.MEM_NUM_REP = #{memNum}
and r.TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and r.CONTENTS like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and m.nick like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and g.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and g.detail like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and r.input_date >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and r.input_date < to_date(#{endDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') + 1
and r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE = '00'
and r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE not in ('00', '11')
and r.PROCESS_STATUS_CODE = '11'
) where rnum between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
